data.fullContent: This chapter will describe the ways in which you teach and the ways that your students perceive their learning environment help to affect their cognitive development as they grow. This includes the type of teaching style that you execute and how the students see you as your role as a teacher. How the classroom is built for students to develop academically and emotionally will also be a factor in this chapter. Relationships between students and teachers will be analyzed to determine the impact they have on learners.
data.answer: 本章将描述您的教学方式，以及您的学生如何感知他们的学习环境，从而在他们成长的过程中影响他们的认知发展。这包括你所执行的教学风格的类型，以及学生如何看待你作为老师的角色。如何为学生在学术上和情感上的发展建立课堂也将是本章的一个因素。学生和教师之间的关系将被分析，以确定他们对学习者的影响。
